description: The new MacBook Pro is here, and it's the most powerful MacBook ever. With a new M2 chip, a Liquid Retina XDR display, and a longer battery life, this is the MacBook for everyone.
para: The new MacBook Pro is the perfect machine for creative professionals and power users alike. With its powerful M2 chip, it can handle even the most demanding tasks with ease. description: The new Pixel 6 Pro is here, and it's the best Pixel yet. With a new design, a powerful Google Tensor chip, and a great camera system, this is the phone to beat.
para: The new Pixel 6 Pro is a major upgrade over the previous generation. It has a new design that is both sleek and stylish. The camera system is also top-notch, with a new 50MP main sensor that takes stunning photos in any lighting condition.

description: The new Xbox Series X is here, and it's the most powerful console ever. With a custom AMD Zen 2 CPU and a custom RDNA 2 GPU, this console can handle even the most demanding games with ease.
para: The new Xbox Series X is the perfect console for gamers who want the best possible performance. It's also a great choice for those who want to future-proof their gaming experience. The console is backwards compatible with all Xbox One games, so you can still play your old favorites. And it's ready for the next generation of games, with support for up to 8K resolution and 120fps gameplay.
